name: The enemy of the planets
description:
The game about killer comet inspired by Snake vs Block. The difference is that the blocks not only reduce life but also change the deviation from the target planet. Blocks can be two type: plus or minus offset. When the offset is zero, the planet will be destroyed.

9 planet of the Solar System with individual characteristics vs comet with 5 types of upgrades. Each improvement increases your chances of winning.

This game requires concentration and quick reaction.
